allow:
Bash(powershell -Command "
# Look for patterns in the cache file where there are multiple messages with downloads
$content = Get-Content discord_raw_cache.json | Select-Object -First 100 -Skip 9229
$content | Where-Object { $_ -match ''github\\.com.*releases|dropbox|drive\\.google|mediafire|mega\\.nz'' } | Select-Object -First 10
")
